definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Publication of academic works on more than 10 articles and two monographs.
sentences.chinese: 發表學術論著10餘篇和參編專著2本。

sentences.english: The reference and Citation in academic papers closely relate to intellectual property.
sentences.chinese: 學述論著中的參考引文與知識產權有着密切的關係。

sentences.english: For the alchemists and the Six Dynasties'novels, previous studies have been on a lot.
sentences.chinese: 對於方士和六朝小說，前人已有很多的研究論著。

sentences.english: there were lots of texts that were inspired, and there were different levels of inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 有很多神啓的論著，而且神啓程度不同。

sentences.english: With her sister during the 1880s, she also established a training school for kindergarten teachers.
sentences.chinese: 另外，她還和姐姐合作撰寫了一些著名的教育學論著。

sentences.english: The expression of that was the advent of plenty of calligraphic theories.
sentences.chinese: 其表現就是書學論著的大量出現。

sentences.english: Master, pioneering research is reflected in the treatise of gold.
sentences.chinese: 大師開拓性的研究成果，都反映在一字千金的論著中。

sentences.english: "Siming Poetry" is an outstanding poem in the Ming Dynasty of the study.
sentences.chinese: 《四溟詩話》是明代一部卓越的詩學論著。

sentences.english: Recently there appeared two works that mentioned the so-called Qi State bird-worm inscription existing in the Qi bronze wares.
sentences.chinese: 近來有兩種論著提到所謂齊國銅器中的鳥蟲書。

sentences.english: I have published 15 papers and participated in the preparation of 3 books.
sentences.chinese: 共發表論著十五篇，參與編書3部。

sentences.english: Book Series on Globalization is the first set of books on globalization published in China.
sentences.chinese: 《全球化論叢》是我國出版的第一套全球化論著。

sentences.english: “Jemima Puddleduck” is a treatise on enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 其中，《傑米瑪鴨媽媽》是一本有關企業的論著。

definition: variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
reference book (such as dictionary, almanac, gazetteer etc)
variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
